cr.title: Orderly and Responsible Iraq Redeployment Appropriations Act, 2008
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, I thank the gentleman for yielding. Mr. Speaker and Members, I rise in strong support of the bill that is before us today. cr.topics: Intelligence Authorization Act For Fiscal Year 2009: IN THE COMMITTEE OF THE WHOLE

cr.title: The Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act
cr.excerpt: Well, I thank the gentleman for yielding. cr.title: Iraq War Resolution
cr.topics: Iraq War Resolution: MOMENT OF SILENCE OBSERVED IN MEMORY OF THE HONORABLE CHARLIE NORWOOD
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, I thank the chairman for recognizing me for time. Mr. Speaker and Members, as a combat veteran, from the bottom of my heart, I say thank you to the brave men and women who have served in Iraq, each with great distinction. Our troops have done an outstanding job. They have done all that has been asked of them and more. They...

cr.title: Expressing Sense of Congress Regarding Need For Additional Research Into Hydrocephalus
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, I thank the gentleman for yielding. I am here today to ask all of my colleagues to support this resolution. Hydrocephalus is an abnormal buildup of fluid in the brain, and it affects nearly 1 million Americans. Without treatment, hydrocephalus is fatal, but when treated, most people with this condition can lead full and...

cr.title: Blue Dog Coalition Deficits and Debt Background
cr.excerpt: Madam Speaker, I appreciate the gentleman from Arkansas, and I thank the gentleman from Arkansas and I appreciate your leadership on this issue. cr.title: Providing Exception to Limit on Medicare Reciprocal Billing Arrangements
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, on that I demand the yeas and nays.
